      • xmlToPlainText

        public static java.lang.String xmlToPlainText(java.lang.String conc,
                              boolean makeNonBreaking)
        Takes an XML input string and... * removes tags * replaces entities with characters * normalizes whitespace * (optionally) replaces spaces with non-breaking spaces
        Parameters:
        conc - the input XML string
        makeNonBreaking - if true, the output string only contains non-breaking spaces
        Returns:
        the plain text output string
